io.micronaut.configuration.kafka.serde

Class JsonSerde<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.configuration.kafka.serde.JsonSerde<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type to serialize/deserialize
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Deserializer<T>, Serde<T>, Serializer<T>

    @Prototype
public class JsonSerde<T>
extends Object
implements Serializer<T>, Deserializer<T>, Serde<T>
    A Serializer and Deserializer for JSON.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
